channel.title: Skill handler

item.title: Skill handler
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

my server seems to be rejecting my fishing handler :\

the handler file itself isnt error its the declaration method in client.java thats making it have a cowâ€¦

server.FishHandler.shark(playerID);

is in client.java

public void shark(int i) { PlayerHandler _tmp = server.playerHandler; client p = (client)PlayerHandler.players[i]; if(p.actionTimer == 0) { p.actionTimer = 45; p.startAnimation(618); p.addItem(785, 1); p.addSkillXP(950 * p.playerLevel[10], 10); p.sendMessage("You have catched a shark"); p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } is in FishHandler.java

anyone got ideas?

Read full topic
